---
title: "Package index"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(pkgdoc)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

custom_table <- function(data) {
  pick <- select(data, topic, title)
  knitr::kable(pick, col.names = NULL)
}

link <- "https://maurolepore.github.io/{package}/reference/{topic}.html"
docs <- reference_package("pkgdoc", url_template = link)
```

### Main

```{r}
main <- filter(docs, concept == "main functions")
custom_table(main)
```

### Other

```{r}
other <- anti_join(docs, main)
custom_table(other)
```
